alert.note: Alert for Adams; Jay (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Adams and Jay Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Berne to Pennville. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portland, Berne, Dunkirk, Redkey, Geneva, Westchester, Center, Bryant, Salamonia, Trinity, Ceylon, Brice, Como, Bellfountain, College Corner, Boundary City, Liber, Blaine, Collett and New Corydon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern and east central Indiana.
